definition: Contracts, statements of work, and formal agreements with customers, vendors, and partners.

propagation_rules: Drafting _ Review _ e-Signature _ Document Repository _ Archive

definition: Records describing opportunities, pipelines, deals, quotes, and commercial performance metrics.

examples: CRM opportunity records, sales pipeline snapshots, quotations, order books.

definition: Structured indicators and context used to describe threats, attacker behaviours, and campaigns.

examples: IOCs, threat feeds, TTP catalogues, malware family tags, campaign profiles.
propagation_rules: External Feeds _ Threat Intel Platform _ Detection Engineering _ SIEM / Data Lake
